## waitFor() function

Reject after a set number of attempts if the given predicate does not return true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function waitFor(cb: PredicateC0, step: number, count: number): Promise<void>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | PredicateC0 |  |
|  step | number |  |
|  count | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions
